question:
In response to a recent editorial slamming the agency’s newest advertising campaign, the agency spokesman denounced the piece as ________ adversarial motives, due to the editorialist’s position on the board of the agency’s primary competitor.
Two Answers
A. stemming from
B. producing
C. typifying
D. epitomized by
E. engendered by
F. creating
Show
Hide
